Monitoring and Measuring in Digital Environments

This module explores key aspects of digital marketing monitoring, measuring and evaluation strategy, developing your skills in identifying improvements to digital communications. You will develop an appreciation of how measurement techniques can be aligned to business objectives. This module also provides the opportunity to conduct market research and social listening in aim to monitor and measure the wider digital environment.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Present an understanding of the importance of monitoring and measuring digital marketing. [Knowledge and Understanding]

+  Analyse a range of business sectors using market research to identify the digital monitoring and measuring strategies and explore how it informs an understanding of the wider digital environment. [Enquiry, Analysis, Application]

+  Reflect on how research into the wider digital environment informs digital marketing practice.[Reflection]
